title: Rob Handfield Finds Lack of Coordination in National Vaccine Distribution
description: Rob Handfield Finds Lack of Coordination in National Vaccine Distribution
cleaned_text: Feb 5, 2021 Lisa Chang Volunteers Time to Administer COVID-19 Vaccines Poole College of Management's Lisa Chang, director of the Technology, Entrepreneurship and Commercialization (TEC) program, was interviewed by WRAL about her voluntary efforts to administer the COVID-19 vaccines around North...
